headline: TD Cowen Downgrades Domino’s Pizza (DPZ) to ‘Hold’, Reduces PT to $460
summary: Domino’s Pizza, Inc. (NASDAQ:DPZ) is one of the best restaurant stocks to buy now. On January 5, 2026, Domino’s Pizza, Inc. (NASDAQ:DPZ) faced a more cautious stance from Wall Street. TD Cowen analyst Andrew Charles downgraded the stock from “Buy” to “Hold” and reduced his price target from $500 to $460. While Charles remains content […]

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Target This Week and 2 We Avoid
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.
